newsitem.title: SWEDEN: Swedish repo tender drains 63 bln SKR from market.
newsitem.headline: Swedish repo tender drains 63 bln SKR from market.

text.p: Sweden's central bank Riksbank said on Tuesday it had drained 63 billion crowns from the market in Tuesday morning's reverse repurchase operation.
The reverse repo was set a rate of 4.85 percent, a cut of 10 basis points from the last tender, and will run from October 23 to October 30.
It replaces an operation that drained 65 billion crowns from the market.
The Riksbank said 15.48 percent of the bids for the tender were allocated.
